name: The Story of Us
description:
Hi everyone!

I wanted to share this since I thought it was a great idea, and a cute way for a gamer to propose (hopefully your SO is receptive too!). This is a very short game (5 minutes or less), with questions about the history of our relationship. You can't lose and the only reward is getting to the end :) Scroll down to the bottom for a list of the answers, although guessing wrong has no penalty so feel free to guess away :)

This was presented on a Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite

Also, she said yes ;)

Assets and tools used:

Unity 2020 LTS (The best <3)

Synty Town (including a big part of their demo scene to speed up production, thank you!).

Synty Office

Text Animator for Unity

Epic Toon FX

Everyday Motion Pack & Mixamo animations

PolyPerfect Low Poly Animals (the cat)

Big Universal Music Collection

A big thanks to all the artists who publish and sell their work for others to incorporate in their commercial works. The sky is the limit with the tools we have at our disposal today :)

CORRECT RESPONSES (Spoilers):

- At School

- A creep (yes, don't judge lol)

- Son, Leo (he's amazing <3)

- in January

- Gucci ("our" cat) :)

- Any response you want at the end :)
